sourcesContent: import*as t from"react";import{getConsecutiveIntArray as r}from"../shared/utils.mjs";const a="...",m=(m,o,n=1)=>t.useMemo((()=>{const t=Math.max(m,1),s=Math.max(n,1),e=Math.max(t,o),i=e;if(e<5+2*s)return r(1,e);const c=Math.max(t-s,1),h=Math.min(t+s,i),u=c>2,M=h<i-1;if(u&&!M){const t=r(i-(3+2*s)+1,i);return[1,a,...t]}if(!u&&M){return[...r(1,3+2*s),a,i]}const f=r(c,h);return[1,a,...f,a,i]}),[m,o,n]);export{a as ELLIPSIS,m as useRange};
